title: Get service's ClusterIP, create a temp busybox pod and 'hit' that IP with wget
description: Get service's ClusterIP, create a temp busybox pod and 'hit' that IP with wget

steps: 1. kubectl get svc nginx # get the IP (something like 10.108.93.130)
3. wget -O- [PUT THE POD'S IP ADDRESS HERE]:80
5. IP=$(kubectl get svc nginx --template={{.spec.clusterIP}}) # get the IP (something like 10.108.93.130)
